en-US.name: Thor Pack
en-US.summary: The thor pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about thor.
en-US.description: The thor pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about thor.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The thor pack adds over 10 thor facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the thor pack.  You now have access to thor facts!
